Verses: 1  Appozhudhu, Avar Thammudaiya Pannirandu Seeshargalaiyum Thammidaththil Varavazhaiththu, Asuththa Aavigalaith Thuraththavum, Sagala Viyaadhigalaiyum, Sagala Noigalaiyum Neekkavum Avargalukku Adhikaaram Koduththaar.
2 andhap Pannirandu Apposthalarudaiya Naamangalaavana: Mundhinavan Pedhuru Ennappatta Seemon, Avan Sagodharan Andhireyaa, Sepedheyuvin Kumaaran Yaakkobu, Avan Sagodharan Yovaan,
3 pilippu, Barththolomeyu, Thomaa, Aayakkaaranaagiya Maththeyu, Albeyuvin Kumaaran Yaakkobu, Thadheyu Ennum Marunaamamulla Lepeyu,
4 kaanaaniyanaagiya Seemon, Avaraik Kaattikkoduththa Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Enpavaigale.
5 indhap Panniruvaraiyum Yesu Anuppugaiyil, Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittu Sonnadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Purajaadhiyaar Naattukkup Pogaamalum, Samaariyar Pattanangalil Piravesiyaamalum,
6 kaanaamar Pona Aadugalaagiya Isravel Veettaaridaththirkup Pongal.
7 pogaiyil, Paralogaraajyam Sameepiththirukkiradhu Endru Pirasangiyungal.
8 viyaadhiyullavargalai Sosthamaakkungal, Kushtarogigalai Suththampannungal, Mariththorai Ezhuppungal, Pisaasugalaith Thuraththungal; Ilavasamaaip Petreergal Ilavasamaaik Kodungal.
9 ungal Kachchaigalil Ponnaiyaavadhu, Velliyaiyaavadhu, Sempaiyaavadhu,
10 vazhikkaakap Paiyaiyaavadhu, Irandu Angikalaiyaavadhu, Paadharatchaigalaiyaavadhu, Thadiyaiyaavadhu Thedi Vaikkavendaam; Velaiyaal Than Aagaaraththukkup Paaththiranaayirukkiraan.
11 endhap Pattanaththilaavadhu Giraamaththilaavadhu Neengal Piravesikkumpodhu, Adhile Paaththiramaanavan Yaarendru Visaariththu, Neengal Purappatumalavum Avanidaththil Thangiyirungal.
12 oru Veettukkul Piravesikkumpodhu Adhai Vaazhththungal.
13 andha Veedu Paaththiramaayirundhaal Neengal Koorina Samaadhaanam Avargalmel Varakkadavadhu; Apaaththiramaayirundhaal Neengal Koorina Samaadhaanam Ungalidaththirkuth Thirumbakkadavadhu;

14 evanaagilum Ungalai Etrukkollaamalum, Ungal Vaarththaigalaik Kelaamalumponaal, Andha Veettaiyaavadhu Pattanaththaiyaavadhu Vittup Purappadumpodhu, Ungal Kaalgalil Padindha Thoosiyai Udharippodungal.
15 niyaayaththeerppu Naalile Andhap Pattanaththirku Nerituvadhaippaarkkilum Sodhom Komoraa Naattirku Neriduvadhu Ilakuvaayirukkum Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollukiren.
16 aatugalai Onaaigalukkulle Anuppugiradhu Pola, Idho, Naan Ungalai Anuppugiren; Aagaiyaal, Sarppangalaippola Vinaavullavargalum Puraakkalaippolak Kapadatravargalumaai Irungal.
17  Manusharaik Kuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Avargal Ungalai Aalosanai Sangangalukku Oppukkoduththu, Thangal Jeba Aalayangalil Ungalai Vaarinaal Adippaargal.
18 avargalukkum Purajaadhiyaarukkum Saatchiyaaga Ennimiththam Adhipadhigalukku Munpaagavum, Raajaakkalukku Munpaagavum Konduppogappaduveergal.
19 avargal Ungalai Oppukkodukkumpodhu: Eppadippesuvom Endrum, Ennaththaip Pesuvom Endrum Kavalaippadaadhirungal; Neengal Pesavendiyadhu Anneraththil Ungalukku Arulappadum.
20  Pesugiravargal Neengal Alla, Ungal Pidhaavin Aaviyaanavare Ungalilirundhu Pesugiravar.
21 sagodharan Than Sagodharanaiyum, Thagappan Than Pillaiyaiyum, Maranaththukku Oppukkoduppaargal; Petrorukku Virodhamaaip Pillaigal Ezhumbi Avargalaik Kolaiseyvaargal.
22 en Naamaththinimiththam Neengal Ellaaraalum Pagaikkappaduveergal; Mudivupariyandham Nilaiththiruppavane Ratchikkappaduvaan.

23 oru Pattanaththil Ungalaith Thunbappaduththinaal Maru Pattanaththirku Odippongal; Manushakumaaran Varuvadharkullaaga Neengal Isravel Pattanangalaiyellaam Sutrimudiyaadhendru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
24 seeshan Than Podhakanilum, Velaikkaaran Than Ejamaanilum Merpattavanalla.

25 seeshan Than Podhakanaippolavum, Velaikkaaran Than Ejamaanaippolavum Iruppadhu Podhum. Veettejamaanaiye Peyalsepool Endru Solvaargalaanaal, Avan Veettaarai Appadi Solvadhu Adhiga Nichchayamallavaa?
26  Avargalukkup Payappadaadhirungal; Veliyaakkappadaadha Maraiporulum Illai; Ariyappadaadha Rakasiyamum Illai.
27 naan Ungalukku Irulile Sollugiradhai Neengal Velichchaththile Sollungal; Kaadhile Ketkiradhai Neengal Veetugalinmel Pirasiththampannungal.

28 aaththumaavaik Kolla Vallavargalaayiraamal, Sareeraththai Maaththiram Kollugiravargalukku Neengal Payappadavendaam; Aaththumaavaiyum Sareeraththaiyum Naragaththile Azhikka Vallavarukke Payappadungal.
29 oru Kaasukku Irandu Adaikkalaan Kuruvikalai Virkiraargal Allavaa? Aayinum Ungal Pidhaavin Siththamillaamal, Avaigalil Ondraakilum Tharaiyile Vizhaadhu.
30 ungal Thalaiyilulla Mayirellaam Ennappattirukkiradhu.
31 aadhalaal, Payappadaadhirungal; Anegam Adaikkalaan Kuruvigalaip Paarkkilum Neengal Viseshiththavargalaayirukkireergal.
32  Manushar Munbaaga Ennai Arikkai Pannugiravan Evano, Avanai Naanum Paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaavin Munbaaga Arikkaip Pannuven.
33 manushar Munbaaga Ennai Marudhalikkiravan Evano, Avanai Naanum Paralogaththilirukkira En Pidhaavin Munbaaga Marudhalippen.
34 boomiyinmel Samaadhaanaththai Anuppavandhen Endru Ennaadhirungal; Samaadhaanaththaiyalla, Pattayaththaiye Anuppavandhen.
35  Eppadiyenil, Maganukkum Thagappanukkum, Magalukkum Thaaikkum, Marumagalukkum Maamikkum Pirivinai Undaakka Vandhen.
36 oru Manushanukkuch Saththurukkal Avan Veettaare.
37 thagappanaiyaavadhu Thaayaiyaavadhu Ennilum Adhigamaai Nesikkiravan Enakkup Paaththiran Alla; Maganaiyaavadhu Magalaiyaavadhu Ennilum Adhigamaai Nesikkiravan Enakkup Paaththiran Alla.
38  Than Siluvaiyai Eduththukkondu Ennaip Pinpatraadhavan Enakkup Paaththiran Alla.
39 than Jeevanaik Kaakkiravan Adhai Izhandhu Povaan; Ennimiththam Than Jeevanai Izhandhupogiravan Adhaik Kaappaan.
40 ungalai Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Etrukkollugiraan; Ennai Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Anuppinavarai Etrukkollugiraan.

41 theerkkadharisi Ennum Naamaththinimiththam Theerkkadharisiyai Etrukkollugiravan Theerkkadharisikketra Balanai Adaivaan; Needhimaan Ennum Naamaththinimiththam Needhimaanai Etrukkollugiravan Needhimaanukketra Balanai Adaivaan.
42 seeshan Ennum Naamaththinimiththam Indha Siriyaril Oruvanukku Orukalasam Thanneer Maaththiram Kudikkak Kodukkiravanum Than Balanai Adaiyaamarpogaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollukiren Endraar.
